column4: hi i was a big fan of linux back in 2006-7 i left it because of driver support for my devices. Has the situation changed can u use windows drivers for printers graphics card basically use windows drivers in linux?
there's very little need to these days.
I haven't ever had the desire to use a windows driver in linux and I've used it since 2006.
that said, my scanner doesn't work in linux, but my scanner is also a lexmark that is worthy of nothing less than a garbage can.
